ygData.subject: Just some things to think about......
ygData.msgSnippet: well doesnt this just make everyone happy?....... Actually......Im glad there are so few enchanters....not only that Im glad there are so few enchanters that
ygData.messageBody:
well doesnt this just make everyone happy?.......


Actually......Im glad there are so few enchanters....not only
that Im glad there are so few enchanters that are happy......Im working on
this char as my second char so I can go bak to my main char or even my
fletcher when I want to.......tell you the truth this is what I thikn the
key is for playing those difficult chars.......there are a FEW chars in EQ
that are EXTREMELY back loaded and never reach their potential becuase ppl
dont have the patience to play......this is not to say that there are not
bugs or problems with the class Im jsut saying that this is not the ONLY
tuff class in EQ......the Wizard is also a VERY difficult class.......I
played a wizard straight out of Release and the falling behind guild members
and leaders was my problem as well.....and this is when I started my
Druid......I FELL IN LOVE!!!>.....the Druid or the Shaman have GOT TO BE the
BEST chars to playin EQ>.......these guys are SO MUCH FUN!!!>......but well
stick to the topic......but the enchanter has ssum draw backs and I dont
think the enchanter will begin to see their full potential unless they are
playing with A) a very organized very detailed group as to role playing and
thigns like that....(not RPing like acting, RPing like knowing your role in
the group combat scenario) which by the way I would like to say there are
four words that we beta testers have learned QUITE WELL!!!>......KNOW YOUR
DAMN ROLE!!!!......this is sumthin that was implemented into the game as a
MAIN FUNCTION of game play......it is the enchanters ROLE to CONTROL THE
BOARD!!!.....the enchanter dusnt do DAMAGE.......the enchanter dusnt get to
HEAL......the enchater dusnt get to TRAVEL.....but the enchanter DOES get to
pick which monsters the group is going to fight and who fights
what.......NOW with all this said lets go bak to what this post
said.....people are unhappy with the char.....ALL THE BETTER FOR
US!!!>......the less there are of us the MORE in demand we wil become as the
game goes on and as we learn more about the game as a whole and the chars
role in the group........when strategies start to arrise from good
enchatners learning thier role we will start to see and welcoming to the
art.......and on tat same note as to what was posted ........the Enchanters
are NOT buffers.......they are DEBUFFERS!!!....and yes your spells get
RESISTED alot......but at higher levels they wont.....and yes if your in a
group fighting reds.....you prolly WONT DO MUCH!!!>.....jsut the way of the
enchanter.......till higher levels that is......just sum thigns to think
about.......



Dymond
